alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 3:28PM MDT until May 11 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Haswell, or 40 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Kiowa County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
